data.prayer: There are 540,000 people living in the county of Doubs. Only about 6,635 might be believers.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Doubs, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 6,635 believers find a person of peace today among the 533,365 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 6,635 believers in Doubs against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Doubs words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Swiss-speaking people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Doubs.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Doubs to agree with you and with one another.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Doubs to exponentially multiply disciples.

location.name: Doubs
location.cities_list: Besançon, La Chaux-de-Fonds, Montbéliard, Pontarlier, Audincourt
location.cities_list_w_pop: Besançon (128,426), La Chaux-de-Fonds (36,825), Montbéliard (28,865), Pontarlier (20,313), Audincourt (15,577)
